rules: === FILE ORGANIZATION ===
Documentation files in docs/ MUST use numbered prefixes (0-26) indicating chronological/logical order. Numbers show sequence from oldest/foundational to newest.
Page files in src/pages/ MUST use numbered prefixes indicating navigation order and importance.
All cross-references in markdown files MUST use the numbered format. When adding new docs, assign the next sequential number.
Organize components by responsibility: pages, layout, reusable UI, hooks, and context files must live in clearly defined folders.
NO documentation files in root directory - all must be in docs/ with proper numbering.
Current doc count: 26 guides (0-README through 26-AI_DASHBOARD_RESTORATION)
=== TYPOGRAPHY SYSTEM (STRICT) ===
Page titles: text-base (16px) with font-bold and tracking-tight. Always include icon container.
Subtitles: text-xs (12px) with text-muted-foreground.
Section titles: text-base (16px) with font-bold.
Card titles: text-base (16px) with font-semibold.
Large numbers/stats: text-3xl (30px) or text-xl (20px) with font-bold and tracking-tight.
Body text: text-sm (14px) with leading-relaxed.
Labels: text-xs (12px) with font-medium.
Button text: text-xs (12px) for all buttons.
Badge text: text-xs (12px) or text-[10px] for compact badges.
Helper text: text-[9px] or text-[10px] with text-muted-foreground.
NEVER use text-2xl, text-xl, or text-lg for page titles. ALWAYS use text-base (16px).
=== ICON CONTAINER PATTERN (REQUIRED) ===
All page headers MUST have icon in a container: bg-primary/10 p-2.5 rounded-xl ring-1 ring-primary/20
Small icons (lists, stats): bg-{color}/10 p-2 rounded-lg ring-1 ring-{color}/20 with h-4 w-4 icon
Medium icons (cards, headers): bg-{color}/10 p-2.5 rounded-xl ring-1 ring-{color}/20 with h-5 w-5 icon
Large icons (page headers): bg-{color}/10 p-3 rounded-xl ring-1 ring-{color}/20 with h-7 w-7 icon
Icon containers with group hover: add group-hover:scale-110 transition-transform
=== COLOR-CODED COMPONENTS ===
Use semantic color coding for different stat/card types:
Blue: bg-blue-500/10, text-blue-600, ring-blue-500/20 (available, general)
Green: bg-green-500/10, text-green-600, ring-green-500/20 (success, earnings, approved)
Amber: bg-amber-500/10, text-amber-600, ring-amber-500/20 (warning, pending)
Purple: bg-purple-500/10, text-purple-600, ring-purple-500/20 (achievement, special)
Red: bg-red-500/10, text-red-600, ring-red-500/20 (danger, overdue, critical)
Emerald: bg-emerald-500/10, text-emerald-600, ring-emerald-500/20 (paid, financial)
Cyan: bg-cyan-500/10, text-cyan-600, ring-cyan-500/20 (messages, communication)
Indigo: bg-indigo-500/10, text-indigo-600, ring-indigo-500/20 (calendar, schedule)
=== BAUHAUS CARD DESIGN (WHEN NEEDED) ===
For featured cards, apply Bauhaus gradient borders using inline styles:
border: '2px solid transparent', backgroundImage with dual gradients (card + primary/10 to transparent)
backgroundOrigin: 'border-box', backgroundClip: 'padding-box, border-box'
boxShadow: '0 2px 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08)' resting, '0 6px 20px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15), 0 0 15px hsl(var(--primary) / 0.2)' on hover
Use onMouseEnter/onMouseLeave to toggle shadow dynamically
NEVER use hover:scale-[1.0x]. Use hover:-translate-y-0.5 for subtle lift instead.
=== HOVER EFFECTS (CONSISTENT) ===
Cards: hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5 transition-all duration-300
Buttons: shadow-md hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5 transition-all
Icon containers: group-hover:scale-110 transition-transform duration-300
Borders: hover:border-primary/30 transition-colors
Backgrounds: hover:bg-primary/10 transition-colors
NEVER use scale transforms on hover for cards. Only use translate-y for lift effect.
=== HORIZONTAL SCROLL PATTERN ===
Container: relative wrapper with overflow-hidden
Scroll area: flex gap-5 overflow-x-auto scrollbar-hide snap-x snap-mandatory
Items: min-w-[400px] w-[400px] shrink-0 snap-start (adjust width as needed)
Navigation arrows: absolute positioned, backdrop-blur-md, circular buttons
Left arrow: left-2, visible when scrolled right (showLeftArrow state)
Right arrow: right-2, visible when can scroll more (showRightArrow state)
Use scrollRef with useEffect to track scroll position and update arrow visibility
Arrow buttons: h-12 w-12 rounded-full bg-background/98 backdrop-blur-md shadow-xl border-2 border-primary/20
Scroll behavior: smooth scrolling with scrollBy() for navigation
=== STATS CARD PATTERN ===
Grid: grid grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4 gap-5
Card structure: Card > CardBody p-5 > flex items-center gap-4
Icon container + content: icon in colored container, then number + label vertically
Number: text-3xl font-bold tracking-tight
Label: text-sm font-medium text-muted-foreground
Trend indicator: TrendingUp/Down icon h-3 w-3 with percentage in text-xs
Clickable stats: add onClick handler and cursor-pointer
=== PAGE HEADER PATTERN ===
Structure: flex items-center justify-between pb-6 border-b border-border/40
Left side: flex items-center gap-3 with icon container + title/subtitle
Right side: flex items-center gap-2 with badges and action buttons
Title spacing: mt-0.5 between title and subtitle
Always include icon container with primary color scheme
=== SECTION HEADER PATTERN ===
Structure: flex items-center justify-between mb-5
Left: flex items-center gap-3 with icon + title/subtitle
Right: Badge variant='outline' with count or Button for actions
Icon container: bg-{color}/10 p-2 rounded-lg ring-1 ring-{color}/20
Title: font-bold text-lg, Subtitle: text-xs text-muted-foreground
=== GRADIENT BACKGROUNDS ===
Page background: bg-gradient-to-br from-background via-background to-muted/20
Card background: bg-gradient-to-br from-card to-card/50 (for featured cards)
Section containers: bg-gradient-to-br from-muted/30 via-muted/20 to-background
Text gradient: bg-gradient-to-r from-foreground to-foreground/70 bg-clip-text text-transparent
Primary gradient (diagonal): bg-primary-gradient - 135deg for icons, buttons, headers
Primary gradient (vertical): bg-primary-gradient-vertical - bottom-to-top for WBS Level 0 nodes (0%: light, 25%: mid, 60-100%: dark)
=== BORDER & RING SYSTEM ===
Subtle border: border border-border/40 or border-border/50
Separator: border-b border-border/30 or border-border/40
Ring for depth: ring-1 ring-primary/20 (or other colors)
Focus ring: focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-primary focus-visible:ring-offset-2
=== SPACING SCALE ===
Container padding: px-6 py-4 or px-6 py-8 (FULL-WIDTH, no container mx-auto)
Dashboard pages: ALWAYS use px-6 py-4 (full-width edge-to-edge)
Section gaps: space-y-8 or space-y-6 (major sections)
Card gaps: gap-5 or gap-6 (card grids)
Inner card padding: p-5 for standard cards, p-7 for featured cards
Icon container padding: p-2 (small), p-2.5 (medium), p-3 (large)
Element gaps: gap-2 (tight), gap-3 (comfortable), gap-4 (standard), gap-5 (spacious)
NEVER use 'container mx-auto' on dashboard pages - dashboards should be full-width
=== BUTTON HIERARCHY ===
Primary action: color='primary' with shadow-md hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5
Secondary action: variant='bordered' with shadow-sm hover:shadow-md hover:border-primary/30
Tertiary action: variant='ghost' or variant='light' with hover:bg-primary/10
Button heights: h-8 for compact (size='sm'), h-10 for standard, h-12 for prominent
Icon buttons: h-8 w-8 p-0 with isIconOnly or similar
All button text MUST be text-xs (12px)
=== BADGE SYSTEM ===
All badges MUST use text-xs (12px) or smaller (text-[10px], text-[9px] for very compact)
Status badges: variant='outline' with color-coded classes (success/warning/danger)
Count badges: bg-primary text-primary-foreground with h-5 w-5 p-0 flex items-center justify-center
Inline badges: px-1.5 py-0 h-4 for very compact inline badges
=== EMPTY STATES ===
Structure: text-center py-12 with icon circle, heading, description, CTA button
Icon circle: bg-muted/50 w-16 h-16 or w-20 h-20 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center mx-auto mb-4
Heading: text-base or text-lg font-semibold mb-2
Description: text-xs or text-sm text-muted-foreground mb-6
CTA: Button size='sm' with icon and action text
=== MODAL/DIALOG PATTERNS ===
Sizes: size='2xl' for standard modals, '3xl' for large forms, '4xl' for complex interfaces
Backdrop: backdrop='blur' for modern look
ScrollBehavior: scrollBehavior='inside' for long content
Footer: ModalFooter with Cancel (danger/light) on left, Confirm (primary) on right
=== TABS PATTERN ===
Use Radix UI Tabs primitive (from shadcn/ui)
Full-width tabs: TabsList className='w-full grid grid-cols-N gap-0'
Underlined style: variant='underlined' with cursor='w-full bg-primary'
Tab height: h-12 or h-10 for standard tabs, h-8 for compact
Tab text: text-xs (12px) with icons when needed
Tab content: TabsContent with space-y-6 or appropriate spacing
=== SCROLL BEHAVIOR ===
Hide scrollbars while keeping scroll: scrollbar-hide class (Tailwind plugin)
Horizontal scroll: overflow-x-auto with snap-x snap-mandatory
Vertical scroll: Use ScrollArea component from shadcn/ui
Scroll snapping: snap-start on items, snap-x snap-mandatory on container
=== FORM PATTERNS ===
Forms are single-column on phones; inputs use ≥16px font-size, labeled fields, and generous touch spacing.
Labels: text-xs or text-sm font-medium text-muted-foreground
Input heights: h-8 for compact, h-10 for standard
Validation: isInvalid prop with errorMessage text-xs in red
Descriptions: text-xs text-muted-foreground below input
Form spacing: space-y-4 between fields
SelectTrigger: MUST use bg-accent hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground text-foreground for theme consistency
Switch: MUST include border-input class for proper visual definition
Textarea: MUST use bg-background for theme compatibility
All form components MUST respect theme system and maintain consistent styling across all themes
=== ANIMATION & TRANSITIONS ===
Standard transition: transition-all duration-300
Hover lifts: hover:-translate-y-0.5
Shadow transitions: shadow-sm → shadow-md → shadow-xl on interaction
Icon scales: group-hover:scale-110 transition-transform duration-300
Respect prefers-reduced-motion: disable animations for users who prefer reduced motion
=== GRID SYSTEMS ===
2-column → 4-column: grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-4 gap-4 or gap-5
1-column → 2-column → 3-column: grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6
Auto-fit responsive: grid grid-cols-[repeat(auto-fill,minmax(300px,1fr))] gap-4
Sidebar layouts: grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 with lg:col-span-2 for main content
=== CARD DESIGN PRINCIPLES ===
Standard card: Card className='group hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-0.5 transition-all duration-300'
Card padding: p-5 for standard, p-7 for featured cards
Card borders: border-border/50 or border-border/40 for subtle definition
Nested cards: smaller padding (p-4 or p-3) for cards within cards
Consistent height: Use items-stretch on flex container and h-full flex flex-col on cards
=== MESSAGE/CHAT INTERFACES ===
Message bubbles: px-4 py-2.5 rounded-2xl with rounded-br-sm (sent) or rounded-bl-sm (received)
Sent messages: bg-primary text-primary-foreground aligned right
Received messages: bg-muted aligned left
Max-width: max-w-[70%] for readability
Timestamps: text-[9px] text-muted-foreground below bubble
Read receipts: CheckCheck icon h-3 w-3, primary color when read
Avatar size in chat: h-7 w-7 for inline message avatars
ThreadList: Conversation names MUST be truncated to 10 characters with ellipsis (...)
ThreadList: Cards MUST use w-full class to fit container width properly
ThreadList: Long conversation names MUST NOT push action buttons out of view
=== AVATAR SYSTEM ===
Small: h-7 w-7 (inline chat)
Standard: h-10 w-10 or h-11 w-11 (lists, headers)
Large: h-16 w-16 (profiles)
Fallback: bg-primary/10 text-primary font-semibold with initials
Online indicator: absolute bottom-0 right-0 w-2.5 h-2.5 or w-3 h-3 bg-green-500 rounded-full ring-2 ring-background
=== PROJECT-SPECIFIC PATTERNS ===
Recent submissions/activity: space-y-3 with p-3 bg-muted rounded-lg items
Timeline separators: flex items-center gap-3 with Separator components and centered text
File upload zones: border-2 border-dashed rounded-lg p-8 text-center with hover:border-primary transition
Progress bars: Use Progress component from shadcn/ui with appropriate value and color
=== COMPONENT COMPOSITION ===
Use modal routes for lightweight actions (create, edit, upload, confirm) and full pages for multi-step flows or detail views.
Apply responsive design with Tailwind breakpoints: sm, md, lg, xl; touch targets must be ≥44px.
All styles must reference Tailwind v4 globals.css tokens and theme system variables—no hardcoded values.
Handle null/undefined states gracefully with skeletons, loaders, and error fallbacks across all async data.
Use shadcn/ui components as the primary UI layer; HeroUI for complex interactive components
Follow React performance best practices: memoization, suspense for async, lazy loading for heavy modules.
=== ACCESSIBILITY (WCAG 2.2 AA) ===
Enforce WCAG 2.2 AA accessibility: semantic HTML, ARIA roles, keyboard navigation, and contrast compliance.
All interactive elements must be keyboard navigable
Icon-only buttons MUST have aria-label
Focus states must be visible (focus-visible:ring-2)
Color contrast must meet AA standards (4.5:1 for text, 3:1 for UI)
Reduced motion: respect prefers-reduced-motion preference
=== STATE MANAGEMENT ===
Use RouteContext and Zustand for global state; async flows must include loading, success, and error states.
Loading states: Use Skeleton components from shadcn/ui
Error states: Alert component with error icon and retry button
Empty states: Centered with icon, message, and CTA
=== RESPONSIVENESS ===
Mobile-first defaults: start with base styles for phones, then progressively enhance with sm/md/lg breakpoints.
Grids adapt: 1 column on mobile, 2 from md, 3–4 from lg with consistent gap utilities.
Navigation collapses into a drawer/disclosure on mobile and becomes a horizontal menu on desktop.
Media is responsive: use aspect-video for video, object-cover for images, and max-w-full for all media.
Buttons are full-width on phones and inline from the sm: breakpoint upward.
=== PERFORMANCE ===
Performance: lazy-load images/videos and defer heavy modules not needed on initial mobile render.
All code must be TypeScript with strict mode enabled; ensure modularity, readability, and testability for enterprise maintainability.
Tree-shaking friendly: import only what you need from component libraries
=== SEARCH & FILTER PATTERNS ===
Search inputs: relative container with Search icon absolute left-3 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2
Input with icon: pl-9 to accommodate left icon
Filter tabs: Use Tabs component with grid layout for equal-width tabs
Combined search + filters: flex flex-col lg:flex-row gap-4 for responsive stacking
=== WORKFLOW & PROCESS ===
All new chats must read all build files, scan for all content, analyze with browser, before any changes are made.
When enhancing existing pages: First analyze current features, then apply typography + Bauhaus styling, avoid unnecessary rebuilds
Always test changes in browser before marking complete
Update audit report (docs/8-ENGINEER_PORTAL_AUDIT_REPORT.md) after each page completion
=== QUALITY STANDARDS ===
Zero linter errors before considering work complete
All interactive features must be tested in browser
Maintain consistent design language across all pages
Use mock data for testing, structure for easy backend integration
Document all major implementations in the audit report
=== AI TOOLS DESIGN SYSTEM (v2.4) ===
AI Tools Pages: 5 hub pages with perfect consistency (Oct 22, 2025)
AI Tools Header Icons: MUST use bg-primary-gradient h-10 w-10 with h-5 w-5 text-white
AI Tools Padding: MUST use p-4 on all containers, headers, and content sections
AI Tools Icon Containers: MUST use bg-primary/10 p-2 rounded-xl ring-1 ring-primary/20 shadow-md
AI Tools Icon Styling: MUST use h-4 w-4 text-primary (separate from container)
AI Tools Colors: MUST use CSS variables and primary opacity variants (no hard-coded colors)
AI Tools Backgrounds: MUST use bg-background and border-border (no gradients on cards)
AI Tools Structure: MUST include header, project selection, tools grid, recent activities, how it works, quick actions
AI Tools How It Works: MUST use 'How It Works?' with Rocket icon across all pages
AI Tools Consistency: All 5 pages MUST have identical styling patterns
AI Tools Reference: src/pages/4-free/15-AIToolsPlanningPage.tsx (gold standard)
ThreadList: Implement 10-character truncation with ellipsis for conversation names
ThreadList: Add w-full class to conversation cards for proper container fitting
Form Components: Ensure SelectTrigger uses theme-consistent styling (bg-accent, text-foreground)
Form Components: Add border-input class to Switch components for visual definition
Form Components: Use bg-background for Textarea components to match theme system
All UI fixes MUST be tested across all themes and responsive breakpoints
=== ROUTING PATTERN ENFORCEMENT (AI TOOLS) ===

AI Tools planning child routes MUST be nested under 'planning' (not siblings): GOOD: <Route path="planning" element={<AIToolsPlanningPage />}> <Route path="gantt" element={<GanttChartTool />} /> </Route>
BAD: <Route path="planning/gantt" element={<GanttChartTool />} /> as a sibling to <Route path="planning" ... />
Parent pages with child routes MUST include <Outlet /> in their JSX to render children.
Catch-all route (path='*') MUST remain last and MUST NOT mask '/free/ai-tools/**' routes.
After routing changes, test direct navigation to '/free/ai-tools/planning/gantt' renders tool without redirect.
=== DESIGN PATTERN ENFORCEMENT ===
Icon Container Pattern: ALWAYS separate container styling from icon styling
Container: bg-primary/10 p-2 rounded-xl ring-1 ring-primary/20 shadow-md
Icon: h-4 w-4 text-primary (applied to icon element, not container)
How It Works Sections: ALWAYS use 'How It Works?' with Rocket icon
Page Headers: ALWAYS use bg-primary-gradient for main page icons
Tool Cards: ALWAYS use consistent icon container pattern across all AI Tools pages
Typography: ALWAYS use text-base (16px) for page titles, text-xs (12px) for subtitles
Spacing: ALWAYS use p-4 for consistent padding across all AI Tools sections
Colors: ALWAYS use CSS variables (primary, background, border) for theme compatibility
Consistency Check: Before any AI Tools changes, verify against Planning page (gold standard)
Theme Testing: ALL changes MUST work across all 11 theme presets
No Hard-coded Colors: NEVER use specific color values, always use CSS variables
Gradient Usage: ONLY use gradients for page header icons and step numbers (1,2,3)
Card Backgrounds: ALWAYS use solid backgrounds (bg-background) not gradients
Border Consistency: ALWAYS use border-border for consistent theming
=== WBS VISUALIZATION REFERENCE DIAGRAM PATTERN ===

WBS Level Colors (matching reference diagram): Level 0 (PROJECT) = bg-primary rounded-full (green pill), Level 1 (PHASE) = bg-warning (yellow/amber), Level 2 (CATEGORY) = bg-info (blue), Level 3+ (TASK) = bg-muted (gray)
WBS Typography Scale: Level 0 = text-sm font-semibold uppercase tracking-wide, Level 1 = text-sm font-semibold uppercase, Level 2 = text-sm font-medium, Level 3+ = text-xs font-medium
WBS Tree Connectors: Vertical line (absolute, left:-20px, h-full, w-px, bg-border/40) + Horizontal branch (absolute, top:50%, left:-20px, w-5, h-px, bg-border/40, translateY:-50%)
WBS Spacing: Children use space-y-2 (8px gaps), nodes use px-4 py-2 padding, 40px indentation per level (level × 40px)
WBS Node Structure: Fixed w-6 drag handle container + expand/collapse button + title + duration badge + inline edit toolbar
WBS Toolbar: Static position above canvas (not absolute inside), p-3 bg-muted/30 border rounded-lg, flex flex-wrap gap-2
WBS Edit Buttons: opacity-60 default, group-hover:opacity-100 (discoverable but subtle)
WBS Canvas: Fixed h-[600px], padding: 24px 16px, overflow-auto with zoom transform
WBS Theme Colors: Use CSS utility classes (.bg-warning, .bg-info, .text-warning-foreground, .text-info-foreground) defined in index.css
=== AI-POWERED DASHBOARD PATTERN (v4.0 - Jan 2025) ===
Reference Component: src/components/portal/shared/AIPoweredDashboard.tsx (361 lines)
ALL dashboards (client, engineer, enterprise) MUST use AIPoweredDashboard with role-specific data props only
Stats Row: 4 cards with sparklines (recharts LineChart), trend indicators, Bauhaus hover effect
Conversation List: Left panel with search, All/Starred tabs, scrollable list, delete on hover
AI Chat Center: Robot icon with bg-primary-gradient, welcome message, quick-action toolbar, input with Send button
Recent Projects: Bottom section with progress bars, status badges, click to open Project Details panel
Project Details Panel: Right-side conditional/dismissible panel (380px width), appears only when project selected, X button to close
Quick Actions Toolbar: Horizontal scrollable buttons below AI welcome message (role-specific: 6 actions per role)
Grid Layout: Main content expands/contracts based on Project Details panel state (lg:col-span-2 or full)
Responsive: Desktop 3-col (conversations + chat + details), Tablet 2-col (details overlay), Mobile stacked
Sparkline Charts: Mini LineChart from recharts with last 6 months trend data, 40px height, no axes, primary stroke
Typography: text-2xl page welcome, text-base card titles, text-sm body, text-xs labels, text-[10px] timestamps
Spacing: p-6 main container, p-4 card content, gap-4 grids, space-y-6 sections
Code Reduction: -71% average per dashboard vs previous implementations (92 lines client, 71 engineer, 72 enterprise)
Dashboard Entry Points: Import AIPoweredDashboard + pass config props (stats, quickActions, projects, conversations, aiWelcomeMessage)
Unified Component Benefits: Single source of truth, identical UI/UX across all tiers, theme-agnostic, easier maintenance
